name: Wandering Nowhere
description:
Submission for Moonjam. Didn't have too much time to get it together because of life but most of what I envisioned is here.

You have arrived in a strange field covered in a thick fog. You see a small table in front of you. On top is an hourglass... you get the feeling it has been waiting for you.

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Mouse to look

- Esc for pause menu

- E to pick up the hourglass
